attributes.action: Evacuation of civilians, children in Gaza And West Bank being bombed.
attributes.additional_details:
The evacuation of civilians in warzones is designed to protect people, especially children, from the risks associated with aerial bombing of cities by moving them to areas thought to be less at risk. 
We as a leading nation have helped many people seek asylum from warzones around the world.
No effort is being made to help the people of gaza and west bank. We can prevent unnecessary deaths.
attributes.background:
To safely remove civilians from areas targeted by israeli defence forces
 Especially in civilian areas where homes are being destroyed. No effort has been made to preserve the lives of inocent people being caught between the conflict.

rejection.details:
Decisions relating to specific military or humanitarian efforts by the UK Armed Forces are an operational matter for the Ministry of Defence, and not something that can be decided by petition.

You might like to sign this petition, which calls for a related action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610270
